metadata.title: Blacksand | Real Estate Development & Management in Saudi Arabia
metadata.description: Discover Blacksand — a real estate partner driven by integrity, innovation, and enduring value. Creating exceptional homes, mixed-use developments and commercial properties throughout the Kingdom.

hero.title: We Don't Just Build Developments
hero.subtitle: Discover Blacksand — a real estate partner driven by integrity, innovation, and enduring value.

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: Rooted in legacy, building the future
about.description: Rooted in 75+ years of heritage through Alabdullatif Holding Group, Blacksand is redefining real estate across Saudi Arabia. From community living to iconic landmarks, we transform land into lasting value.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Deliver exceptional value through excellence, integrity, and innovation.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be Saudi Arabia's most trusted real estate developer.

standFor.title: Value Perfected
standFor.description: A promise to deliver unmatched quality, care, and performance from design to long-term care.

services.title: What We Do
services.subtitle: Full-Spectrum Real Estate Development
services.description: We offer an integrated, turnkey model built around precision, flexibility, and care.

feasibility.description: Data-driven financial analysis and budget optimization

transformation.title: Saudi Arabia's transformation is accelerating and Blacksand is helping shape it.

points.zones: Activating untapped tourism, logistics, and industrial zones

transformation.cta: See How We Align with Vision 2030

leaders.title: Leaders
leaders.subtitle: Meet the leaders driving over SAR 25 billion in transformational developments.
leaders.visionDescription: Led by seasoned experts in real estate, finance, and design, our leadership blends legacy trust with visionary ambition.

ceoMessage.content:
At Blacksand, we believe real estate is more than buildings — it's about shaping lasting value for people and communities.

Our legacy began over 75 years ago, built on craftsmanship, care, and trust. Today, we carry that legacy forward with a vision to contribute meaningfully to Saudi Arabia's transformation.

We're not just developing land — we're creating spaces where life happens, families grow, and futures begin. With every project, our promise is simple: build with purpose, deliver with integrity, and never compromise on quality.

Thank you for being part of this journey.
ceoMessage.name: Omar bin Ahmed Al-Abdullatif
ceoMessage.title: CEO, BLACKSAND

socialImpact.title: We build for people — not just for profit.

cta.title: Ready to Build the Future Together?
cta.subtitle: Let our experts help you discover exceptional real estate opportunities in Saudi Arabia

footer.description: Blacksand is a real estate development and management partner. We create and manage exceptional homes, mixed-use developments and commercial properties throughout the Kingdom.

businessAddress.title: The Business Address
businessAddress.description: A future-focused commercial hub in Riyadh, blending premium workspaces with walkable access and curated dining. Built around smart mobility and modern professional lifestyles.

townCenter.title: Town Center
townCenter.description: An urban village for everyday life — blending retail, services, hospitality, and wellness in a vibrant, family-friendly setting.

americanExpress.title: American Express HQ
americanExpress.description: A build-to-suit headquarters reflecting American Express's global standards. Delivered with precision and post-handover performance.

residentialCommunities.title: Residential Communities
residentialCommunities.description: Human-centered design meets practical living. Blacksand residences offer walkability, modern amenities, and elegant design at scale.
